name: Peleman Webshop Plugin
author: Peleman Industries

sections.description:
This plugin allows a WordPress/WooCommerce webshop to show and sell Peleman products.
Some of our products require user content to either be uploaded and/or created in an online editor, which is made possible through this plugin.

2.1.0

  • Display the paper dimension type on product page
  • Specify the desired margin of error for the uploaded PDFs
  • Set a minimum order quantity for the selected products
  • Checkout button removed from mini cart
  • Change the displayed dimension unit on product page

2.0.1

  • Add the checkbox to toggle project reference
  • Add the toggable input field for the project reference
  • Passing the project name to editor and back to the site
  • Make the project reference visible in the cart

2.0.0

  • Combine all versions

1.5.2

  • Add – project thumbnails now visible in order package
  • Add – added various action and filter hooks to existing PWP methods to allow connections to other plugins.
  • Update – replaced previous PDF parser.

1.5.0

  • removal of various F2D specific functions
  • Fix – issue with F2D settings button in menu resolved.
  • Add – Displaying F2D article code on products in webshop. Underlying architecture also improved.

1.4.0

  • improved product definition panels
  • many minor bugs fixed
  • optimization and stabilization improvements

1.3.2

  • updated admin control panels. Now uses tabs instead of multiple submenus.
  • improved styling of product definition forms.
  • improved display of bundled product pricing and general information.
  • performance updates

1.1.10:

  • updating system based on feedback by the WordPress Foundation upon review
  • Fix – Readme.txt formatting and contents
  • Update – replacing Curl with WP HTTP API.

=1.0.00=
* first public release of the plugin

short_description: A plugin for Peleman & partnered webshops, allowing for the sale of customizable products.
